strength_details: Working for established enterprise company (TCS) with job security
concern_details: Below-market compensation for data engineering role ($80-85k vs $100-120k+ market rate)
After-hours and weekend on-call duties explicitly required
Legacy technology stack (SFTP, GoAnywhere MFT, WinSCP) with no modern tools
No career growth, learning opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned
Operations/maintenance role rather than development - limited technical growth
best_fit_details: Junior-to-mid level engineers seeking stable enterprise role
Candidates transitioning into data engineering from operations/system administration
probe_details: Clarify actual on-call rotation schedule and frequency
Understand opportunities for working with modern data technologies
Ask about career progression and skill development opportunities
Inquire about team structure and collaboration opportunities
leverage_details: Cincinnati location may provide local candidate advantage if company prefers local hires
summary.overall_assessment: Entry-level data engineering role at large enterprise company with focus on legacy file transfer systems. Below-market compensation, significant on-call requirements, and limited growth opportunities. Suitable for candidates seeking stable enterprise role but not ideal for those wanting modern data stack experience or career advancement.
